flawed_nl_solution:
The vacuum cleaner costs $120, so Daria needs 120 - 20 = $<<120-20=90>>90 more.
Daria will need 90 / 10 = <<90/10=9>>9 more weeks, to be able to buy the vacuum cleaner.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
